metadata.synopsis: At the Emperor's Feeding Room, you can interact with a broken brain jar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on the chains at Emperor's Feeding Room.S_LOW_Elfsong_Basement_PrisonersChains_6906a11f-3502-4b3c-9390-bb567bc7c84b

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: The chains I used to bind my meals - villains and lawbreakers. You see I tried to exercise morality, where I could.
